Affliction.name: Affliction
Affliction.description: Impose some debilitating condition(s) on a target.
Affliction.specialExtras: Alternate Resistance (+0), Concentration (+1), Cumulative (+1), Extra Condition (+1), Progressive (+2)

Burrow.name: Burrow
Burrow.description: You can burrow throught the ground, leaving a tunnel behind if you choose.

Communication.name: Communication
Communication.description: You can communicate over a distance using a medium other than your normal voice.

Comprehend.name: Comprehend
Comprehend.description: You can comprehend different sorts of communication.

Concealment.name: Concealment
Concealment.description: You gain total concealment from a particular sense while this effect is active.

Create.name: Create
Create.description: You can form solid objects essentially out of nowhere.

Custom.name: Custom
Custom.description: Use this Power Effect to represent any other effect you want.

Damage.name: Damage
Damage.description: You can inflict damage by making a close attack.

Dazzle.name: Dazzle
Dazzle.description: Created Power: Ranged, Cumulative Affliction, Limited to One Sense

Deflect.name: Deflect
Deflect.description: You can actively defend for characters other than yourself, deflecting or diverting attacks.

Element Control.name: Element Control
Element Control.description: Created Power: Perception Ranged Move Object, Limited to Element

Elongation.name: Elongation
Elongation.description: You can elongate your body and/or limbs to extend your reach.

Energy Aura.name: Energy Aura
Energy Aura.description: You can surround your body with an aura of damaging energy or similar effect. Created Power: Damage, Reaction

Energy Control.name: Energy Control
Energy Control.description: You can generate and project a type of energy.  Created Power: Ranged Damage

Enhanced Advantages.name: Enhanced Advantages
Enhanced Advantages.description: Your powers grant you additional Advantages.

Enhanced Trait.name: Enhanced Trait
Enhanced Trait.description: You can temporarily improve one of your existing traits.

Environment.name: Environment
Environment.description: You can change the environment in an area.

Create Intense Cold.name: Create Intense Cold
Create Intense Cold.description: You can lower the temperature in the area to intense cold.

Create Extreme Cold.name: Create Extreme Cold
Create Extreme Cold.description: You can lower the temperature in the area to extreme levels.

Create Intense Heat.name: Create Intense Heat
Create Intense Heat.description: You can raise the temperature in the area to intense heat.

Create Extreme Heat.name: Create Extreme Heat
Create Extreme Heat.description: You can raise the temperature in the area to extreme levels.

Impede Movement.name: Impede Movement
Impede Movement.description: You can impede movement through the area with high winds, icy or wet surfaces, or similar effects, reducing movement speed by 1 rank.

Severely Impede Movement.name: Severely Impede Movement
Severely Impede Movement.description: You can severely impede movement through the area with high winds, icy or wet surfaces, or similar effects, reducing movement speed by 2 ranks.

Generate Light.name: Generate Light
Generate Light.description: You can create enough light to reduce total concealment to partial and partial concealment to none.

Generate Daylight.name: Generate Daylight
Generate Daylight.description: You can shed light as bright as a sunlit day, eliminating all concealment provided by natural darkness.

Reduce Visibility.name: Reduce Visibility
Reduce Visibility.description: You impose a -2 modifier to Perception checks.

Severely Reduce Visibility.name: Severely Reduce Visibility
Severely Reduce Visibility.description: You impose a -5 modifier to Perception checks.

Extra Limbs.name: Extra Limbs
Extra Limbs.description: You have extra manipulative limbs, such as arms, tentacles, or even prehensile hair or a tail.

Feature.name: Feature
Feature.description: You have one or more minor features, effects granting you an occasional useful ability.

Flight.name: Flight
Flight.description: You can fly through the air, including hovering.
Flight.specialFlaws: Concentration (-1), Distracting (-1), Gliding, (-1), Levitation (-1), Platform (-1), Wings (-1)

Force Field.name: Force Field
Force Field.description: You can surround your body with a protective field.  Created Power: Protection, Sustained

Growth.name: Growth
Growth.description: You can temporarily increase your size.

Healing.name: Healing
Healing.description: You can heal Damage conditions by touching a subject and taking a standard action.
Healing.specialExtras: Action (+1), Affects Objects (+1), Area (+1), Energizing (+1), Perception (+1), Ranged (+1), Restorative (+1), Resurrection (+1), Selective (+1)

Illusion.name: Illusion
Illusion.description: You can control others' senses to create false impressions or illusions.

One Sense Types.name: One Sense Types
One Sense Types.description: You can create an illusion affecting a single sense type.

Two Sense Types.name: Two Sense Types
Two Sense Types.description: You can create an illusion affecting two sense types. (Visual senses counts as two types.)

Three Sense Types.name: Three Sense Types
Three Sense Types.description: You can create an illusion affecting three sense types. (Visual senses counts as two types.)

Four Sense Types.name: Four Sense Types
Four Sense Types.description: You can create an illusion affecting four sense types. (Visual senses counts as two types.)

Five Sense Types.name: Five Sense Types
Five Sense Types.description: You can create an illusion affecting all sense types.

Illusion.specialFlaws: Feedback (-1), Limited to One Subject (-1), Ranged (-1), Resistible (-1)

Immunity.name: Immunity
Immunity.description: You are immune to certain effects.
Immunity.specialExtras: Affects Others (+1), Sustained (+0), Ranged (+1), Reflect (+1), Redirect (+1)

Impervious.name: Impervious
Impervious.description: One trait that you specify becomes Impervious.

Impervious Toughness.name: Impervious Toughness
Impervious Toughness.description: Your Toughness defense becomes Impervious up to your rank.  This does not add to your Toughness defense.

Insubstantial.name: Insubstantial
Insubstantial.description: You can assume a less solid form, with each rank becoming progressively less solid.
Insubstantial.specialExtras: Affects Others (+0 or +1), Attack (+0 or +1), Continuous (+1), Progressive (+0), Reaction (+1)
Insubstantial.specialFlats: Affects Corporeal (+1), Innate (+1), Precise (+1), Subtle (+1 or +2), Absent Strength (-1)

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: You can vanish from sight at will.  Created Power: Visual Concealment

Invisible to Normal Vision.name: Invisible to Normal Vision
Invisible to Normal Vision.description: You are invisible to normal vision.

Invisible to All Vision.name: Invisible to All Vision
Invisible to All Vision.description: You are invisible to any visual sense (including infrared and ultraviolet).

Leaping.name: Leaping
Leaping.description: You can make prodigious leaps, far more than even a skilled athlete.

Luck Control.name: Luck Control
Luck Control.description: You influence luck in various ways.

Magic.name: Magic
Magic.description: You are a sorcerer, witch, or wizard able to cast a variety of spells.  Your basic effect is a Blast (Ranged Damage).

Mental Blast.name: Mental Blast
Mental Blast.description: You can strike targets' minds with "mental force".  Created Power: Perception Ranged Damage, Resisted by Will

Mimic.name: Mimic
Mimic.description: You can duplicate the traits of another character you can perceive.  Created Power: Variable

Mind Control.name: Mind Control
Mind Control.description: You can impose your will on others.  Created Power: Perception Ranged, Cumulative Affliction, Resisted by Will

Mind Reading.name: Mind Reading
Mind Reading.description: You can read another character's mind.
Mind Reading.specialFlaws: Close (-1), Feedback (-1), Limited by Language (-1), Limited to Emotions (-1), Limited to Sensory Link (-1), Ranged (-1), Sense-Dependent (-1)

Move Object.name: Move Object
Move Object.description: You can move objects at a distance without touching them.
Move Object.specialFlats: Improvised Weapon or Throwing Mastery (+1 per rank), Precise (+1), Subtle (+1)

Movement.name: Movement
Movement.description: You have a special form of movement.

Nullify.name: Nullify
Nullify.description: Nullify can counter effects of a particular descriptor, such as fire or magic.
Nullify.specialExtras: Alternate Resistance (+0), Area (+1), Broad (+1), Concentration (+1), Simultaneous (+1), Effortless (+1), Randomize (+0), Selective (+1), Sustained (+1)

Power-Lifting.name: Power-Lifting
Power-Lifting.description: Your lifting and carrying capacity is out of proportion with the rest of your Strength.  Created Power: Enhanced Strength, Limited to Lifting

Protection.name: Protection
Protection.description: Protection shields you against damage, giving you +1 Toughness defense per rank.

Quickness.name: Quickness
Quickness.description: You can perform routine tasks fast.
Quickness.specialFlaws: Limited to One Type (-1), Limited to One Task (-2)

Ranged Affliction.name: Ranged Affliction
Ranged Affliction.description: Impose some debilitating condition(s) on a target.
Ranged Affliction.specialExtras: Alternate Resistance (+0), Concentration (+1), Cumulative (+1), Extra Condition (+1), Progressive (+2)

Remote Sensing.name: Remote Sensing
Remote Sensing.description: You can displace one or more of your senses over a distance.

One Sense Type.name: One Sense Type
One Sense Type.description: Sense remotely with just one sense.

Two Sense Types.name: Two Sense Types
Two Sense Types.description: Sense remotely with two different senses.

Three Sense Types.name: Three Sense Types
Three Sense Types.description: Sense remotely with three different senses.

Four Sense Types.name: Four Sense Types
Four Sense Types.description: Sense remotely with four different senses.

Five Sense Types.name: Five Sense Types
Five Sense Types.description: Sense remotely with all of your senses.

Remote Sensing.specialFlats: Dimensional (+1 per rank), Subtle (+1 per rank), Noticeable (-1)

Senses.name: Senses
Senses.description: One or more of your senses are improved or you have additional sensory abilities beyond the normal five senses.
Senses.specialExtras: Affects Others (+1), Area (+1), Dimensional (+1), Ranged (+1 or +2)

Shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
Shapeshift.description: You can transform into different forms, gaining physical traits.  Created Power: Variable

Shrinking.name: Shrinking
Shrinking.description: You can temporarily decrease your size.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description: You cause the target to feel tremendous weariness.  Created Power: Ranged Affliction, Resisted by Fortitude

Snare.name: Snare
Snare.description: You can restrain a target with bonds.  Created Power: Ranged, Cumulative Affliction, Extra Condition, Resisted by Dodge, Limited Degree

Speed.name: Speed
Speed.description: You can move faster than normal.

Strike.name: Strike
Strike.description: You inflict additional damage in close combat.  Created Power: Damage

Suffocation.name: Suffocation
Suffocation.description: You render the target unable to breath.  Created Power: Ranged, Progressive Affliction, Resisted by Fortitude

Summon.name: Summon
Summon.description: You can call upon another creature to aid you.
Summon.specialExtras: Active (+1), Controlled (+1), Heroic (+2), Horde (+1), Multiple Minions (+2), Variable Type (+1 or +2)

Super-Speed.name: Super-Speed
Super-Speed.description: You are fast!  Created Power: Enhanced Initiative, Quickness, Speed.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: You can move instantly from place to place.
Teleport.specialFlats: Change Direction (+1), Change Velocity (+1), Increased Mass (+1), Turnabout (+1)

Transform.name: Transform
Transform.description: You can change objects into other objects.

Single Transform.name: Single Transform
Single Transform.description: Transform one thing or substance into one other thing or substance, such as metal into wood, iron into glass, or broken objects into repaired ones.

Transform Group of Things.name: Transform Group of Things
Transform Group of Things.description: Transform a broad group of things into a single result (any metal into gold, for example) or a single target into any of a broad group (one type of metal, such as lead, into any other metal, water into other liquids, and so forth).

Transform Entire Category.name: Transform Entire Category
Transform Entire Category.description: Transform a broad group of targets into one of a broad group of results (solids into other solids, for example).

Transform Anything.name: Transform Anything
Transform Anything.description: Transform any material into anything else.

Variable.name: Variable
Variable.description: You can gain or use potentially any effect of the appropriate type and descriptor!
Variable.specialExtras: Action (+1, +2, or +3), Affects Others (+0 or +1), Perception (+1), Ranged (+1)

Weaken.name: Weaken
Weaken.description: You can temporarily lower one of your target's traits.
Weaken.specialExtras: Affects Objects (+1), Broad (+1), Concentration (+1), Progressive (+2), Selective (+1), Simultaneous (+1)
